siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Set better defaults
frontmatter.description: There will be times for both positive and negative reactions. Look for more subtle ways to communicate. Set better defaults by defining responses that can be easily communicated and understood by others.

frontmatter.title: Dictate direction, avoid anxiety
frontmatter.description: Be proactive about dictating direction of days. Don't wait for news from others to determine next steps.

frontmatter.title: Cows don't realize their mistakes
frontmatter.description: Think of cars as cows, wandering about with their own purpose. The cows don't think about the people around them before moving. There's no sense getting angry at cows either; they won't even undestand the problem. Get around the cows and be ready for them to act in unexpected ways.
